definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: The keepers, Fiori and Kalac , trained apart.
sentences.chinese: 門將費奧裏和卡拉奇，在一旁訓練。
關閉閘門將是非常困難的。

sentences.english: When (Juventus keeper Gigi) Buffon retires, the best goalkeeper will be Igor Akinfeev.
sentences.chinese: 當布馮退役後，當今第一門將將會是阿金費耶夫。

sentences.english: You may need a good goalies for instance. Take your time however.
sentences.chinese: 比如說不論如何你都需要一個好的門將。

sentences.english: He picked out Wazza, and he stretched his leg out and managed to guide it past the keeper.
sentences.chinese: 他將球挑給魯尼，後者伸長了腿，讓球越過了門將。

sentences.english: China's maritime rescue teams will continue to help search and rescue Vietnamese victims and survivors.
sentences.chinese: 中國海上搜救部門將繼續幫助搜救越南遇險漁民。

sentences.english: In addition, the ministry will accelerate construction of an ecological reserve for Qiang ethnic culture.
sentences.chinese: 同時，政府部門將加快羌族文化生態保護區建設。

sentences.english: Vida's also developed a great understanding with his keeper, Edwin van der Sar, which can't be underestimated.
sentences.chinese: 維達能很好的與門將范德薩交流，這點不容低估。

sentences.english: The transport sector will Silverstrand Fu Xian Xianyang paragraph to carry out special maintenance training.
sentences.chinese: 交通部門將對福銀線西安至咸陽段進行專項維修整治。

sentences.english: Harris’ RF Communications Division, of Rochester, N.Y., will provide the radios and support systems.
sentences.chinese: 哈里斯射頻通信部門將提供無線電和支持系統。

sentences.english: The former Atletico Madrid keeper is wasting little time becoming integrated at United and adapting to his new surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 前馬競門將正在嘗試融入球隊，並與新隊友配合。

sentences.english: The goalies trained apart under Vecchi and Abate.
sentences.chinese: 門將則在維奇和阿巴特教練的帶領下單獨訓練。

sentences.english: When the timer runs out the door will be locked forever, locking away the antidote inside it.
sentences.chinese: 到時門將永久被鎖住，解藥也會以後封存。

sentences.english: Can keepers get sent off or injured this year?
sentences.chinese: 本作中門將可以受傷或被罰下嗎？

sentences.english: What I do know is that Clemence was probably the best goalkeeper in Liverpool's history.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道克萊門斯可以算是利物浦歷史上最好的門將。

sentences.english: Carmen throws a flower at him, and the girls go back to work.
sentences.chinese: 卡門將鮮花拋給賀塞，而衆女工重返工作崗位。

definition: middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
to heal a wound/to recuperate (from an injury)
to return to one's unit/to go back to one's station in life
